short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See a hindi quote when you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Preface : I have seen in my life that, if you hear or read anything many times it becomes a profound belief in you. This is effort to pass on the good thoughts / beliefs to all.

About the App : After installing this app whenever you open a new tab it gives you a new thought / poem or  statement from our great poets & ancient text.  The prime focus of the collection is Health & "Bravery".  The actions are depicted in the snapshots.

इस App  को इनस्टॉल करने के बाद जब भी आप कोई नया " chrome tab " खोलेंगे तब आपको एक नयी लोकोक्ति दिखाई देगी | 
मैंने इस बार ज्यादातर स्वास्थ और वीर रस को ही लेने का प्रयास किया है |
